name: Skyline VIP Hospitality Suite
description: The premium VIP suite at the Eldorado, perfect for hosting groups and entertaining. This expansive suite in the Skyline Tower features generous entertaining space, premium furnishings, multiple seating areas, and VIP-level amenities for an unforgettable experience.
shortDescription: Premium VIP hospitality suite for hosting and entertaining in the Skyline Tower.

meta.title: Skyline VIP Hospitality Suite – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Skyline VIP Hospitality Suite at Eldorado Reno – premium entertaining space with VIP amenities.

testimonials.quote: Visited Skyline VIP Hospitality Suite during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Carol M.

testimonials.quote: Skyline VIP Hospitality Suite was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Sean G.
testimonials.meta: Google · date night during golf trip
